trans-unit.source: Mandatory <input>s should have the required attribute applied to them. This will ensure that people navigating with the aid of assistive technology such as a screen reader will be able to understand which inputs need valid content to ensure a successful submission.
trans-unit.target: 强制 <input> 应当具有 required 属性。这将确保在诸如屏幕阅读器之类的辅助技术的帮助下进行导航的人们将能够理解哪些输入需要有效的内容以确保提交成功。

trans-unit.source: Many designers find HSL more intuitive than RGB, since it allows hue, saturation, and lightness to each be adjusted independently. HSL can also make it easier to create a set of matching colors (such as when you want multiple shades of a single hue).
trans-unit.target: 许多设计师发现HSL比RGB更直观,因为它允许独立调整每一个色相、饱和度和明度。HSL还可以更容易地创建一组匹配的颜色(例如当你想要一个单一色调的多个色调时)。

trans-unit.source: Many developers believe that the containing block of an element is always the content area of its parent, but that isn't necessarily true. Let's investigate the factors that determine what an element's containing block is.
trans-unit.target: 很多开发者认为,一个元素的包含块总是其父元素的内容区域,但这并不一定正确。让我们来研究一下决定一个元素的包含块是什么的因素。

trans-unit.source: Many layouts are essentially sets of “cards” – product listings, image galleries, and so on. A grid can make it very easy to create these listings in a way that is responsive without needing to add media queries to make it so. In this next example I’m combining CSS Grid and Flexbox Layouts to make a simple product listing layout.
trans-unit.target: 实际上，许多布局都是“卡片”的集合-产品清单，图像画廊等等。网格可以很容易地以响应方式创建这些列表，而无需添加媒体查询。在下一个示例中，我将结合CSS网格和Flexbox布局来制作简单的产品列表布局。

trans-unit.source: Many media features are range features, which means they can be prefixed with "min-" or "max-" to express "minimum condition" or "maximum condition" constraints. For example, this CSS will apply styles only if your browser's viewport width is equal to or narrower than 12450px:
trans-unit.target: 许多媒体功能都是范围功能，这意味着可以在它们前面加上“最小”或“最大”来表示“最小条件”或“最大条件”约束。例如，仅当您的浏览器的视口宽度等于或小于12450px时，此CSS才会应用样式：

trans-unit.source: Many of the basic font properties (such as font-weight and font-style) are well-supported across browsers, but some of the newer features still have more limited support. For the full story you'll have to look at the browser compatibility information on the individual reference pages.
trans-unit.target: 许多基本字体属性（例如 font-weight 和 font-style ）在浏览器中都得到很好的支持，但是某些较新的功能仍然支持有限。有关完整的故事，您必须查看各个参考页面上的浏览器兼容性信息。

trans-unit.source: Many of the grid examples you will find online make the assumption that you will use grid for main page layout, however grid can be just as useful for small elements as those larger ones. Using grid-template-areas can be especially nice as it is easy to see in the code what your element looks like.
trans-unit.target: 您在网上可以找到的许多网格示例均假设您将网格用于主页布局，但是网格对于较小的元素和较大的元素一样有用。使用 grid-template-areas 可能特别好，因为在代码中很容易看到元素的外观。

trans-unit.source: Many websites are a variation of this type of layout, with content, sidebars, a header and a footer. In a responsive design, you may want to display the layout as a single column, adding a sidebar at a certain breakpoint and then bring in a three-column layout for wider screens.
trans-unit.target: 许多网站都是这种类型布局的变体,有内容、侧栏、页眉和页脚。在响应式设计中,你可能希望以单列的方式显示布局,在某个断点处添加侧栏,然后为更宽的屏幕引入三列布局。

trans-unit.source: Media features describe the specific characteristics of a given user agent, output device, or environment. For instance, you can apply specific styles to widescreen monitors, computers that use mice, or to devices that are being used in low-light conditions. This example applies styles when the user's primary input mechanism (such as a mouse) can hover over elements:

trans-unit.source: Mobile Viewports
trans-unit.target: 移动视口

trans-unit.source: Mobile devices comes in all <s>shapes and</s> sizes, with screens of differing device pixel ratios. The mobile browser's viewport is the area of the window in which web content can be seen, which is not necessarily the same size as the rendered page. Mobile browsers render pages in a virtual window or viewport, generally at 960px, which is usually wider than the screen, and then shrink the rendered result down so it can all be seen at once. Users can then pan and zoom to see different areas of the page. For example, if a mobile screen has a width of 320px, a website might be rendered with a virtual viewport of 960px, and then it will be shrunk down to fit into the 320px space, which, depending on the design, is illegible for many if not everyone. To tell a mobile browser to use the viewport width instead of the default 960px as the width of the screen, developers should include a viewport meta tag, like the following:
trans-unit.target: 移动设备有各种<s>形状，</s>尺寸，以及不同设备像素比率的屏幕。移动浏览器的视口是窗口中可以看到Web内容的区域，不一定与呈现的页面大小相同。移动浏览器在虚拟窗口或视口中渲染页面，通常为960px，通常比屏幕宽，然后将渲染结果缩小，以便可以一次看到所有内容。然后，用户可以平移和缩放以查看页面的不同区域。例如，如果移动屏幕的宽度为320像素，则可以使用960像素的虚拟视口渲染网站，然后将其缩小以适合320像素的空间，这取决于设计，对于许多人来说是难以辨认的如果不是每个人。要告诉移动浏览器使用视口宽度而不是默认的960px作为屏幕宽度，开发人员应包括一个视口元标记，如下所示：

trans-unit.target: 大多数浏览器不支持该参数,如果使用该参数,效果将无法呈现。

trans-unit.source: Most characters can be represented literally. All characters can also be represented with their respective Unicode code points in hexadecimal, in which case they are preceded by a backslash (\). For example, \22 represents a double quote, \27 a single quote ('), and \A9 the copyright symbol (©).
trans-unit.target: 大多数字符可以按字面表示。所有字符也可以用各自的Unicode代码点以十六进制表示，在这种情况下，它们前面带有反斜杠（ \ ）。例如， \22 表示双引号， \27 表示单引号（ ' ）， \A9 表示版权符号（ © ）。

trans-unit.source: Most fonts have a particular weight which corresponds to one of the numbers in Common weight name mapping. However some fonts, called variable fonts, can support a range of weights with a more or less fine granularity, and this can give the designer a much closer degree of control over the chosen weight.
trans-unit.target: 大多数字体具有特定的粗细，该粗细对应于“ 通用粗细”名称映射中的数字之一。但是，某些字体（称为可变字体）可以以某种或多或少的精细粒度支持一定范围的权重，这可以使设计人员对所选权重的控制程度更高。

trans-unit.source: Most modern computers and smartphones have bitmap-based screens. Examples of grid-based devices include text-only terminals and basic phones with only one fixed font.
trans-unit.target: 大多数现代电脑和智能手机的屏幕都是基于位图的。基于网格的设备的例子包括纯文本终端和只有一种固定字体的基本手机。

trans-unit.source: Most of the time, a Web designer will use one of the two CSS properties: column-count or column-width. As values for these properties do not overlap, it is often convenient to use the shorthand columns. E.g.
trans-unit.target: 大多数时候，Web设计人员将使用以下两个CSS属性之一： column-count 或 column-width 。由于这些属性的值不重叠，因此使用速记 columns 通常很方便。例如

trans-unit.source: Most of the time, absolutely positioned elements that have height and width set to auto are sized so as to fit their contents. However, non-replaced, absolutely positioned elements can be made to fill the available vertical space by specifying both top and bottom and leaving height unspecified (that is, auto). They can likewise be made to fill the available horizontal space by specifying both left and right and leaving width as auto.
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，将 height 和 width 设置为 auto 的绝对定位元素的大小调整为适合其内容的大小。但是，可以通过指定 top 和 bottom 并且不指定 height （即 auto ）来使未替换的，绝对定位的元素填充可用的垂直空间。同样，可以通过指定 left 和 right 并将 width 保留为 auto 来填充可用的水平空间。

trans-unit.source: Most standard Western fonts include italic and bold variants, but many novelty fonts do not. Fonts used for Chinese, Japanese, Korean and other logographic scripts tend not to include these variants, and synthesizing them may impede the legibility of the text. In these cases, it may be desirable to switch off the browser's default font-synthesis.
trans-unit.target: 大多数标准的西方字体都包括斜体和粗体变体,但许多新式字体却不包括这些变体。用于中文、日文、韩文和其他逻辑文字的字体往往不包括这些变体,而合成这些变体可能会妨碍文本的可读性。在这些情况下,最好关闭浏览器的默认字体合成功能。

trans-unit.source: Much like the values of properties, each at-rule has a different syntax. Nevertheless, several of them can be grouped into a special category named conditional group rules. These statements share a common syntax and each of them can include nested statements—either rulesets or nested at-rules. Furthermore, they all convey a common semantic meaning—they all link some type of condition, which at any time evaluates to either true or false. If the condition evaluates to true, then all of the statements within the group will be applied.
trans-unit.target: 就像属性的值一样，每个规则都有不同的语法。不过，其中的一些可以分组为一个特殊的类别，称为条件分组规则。这些声明都有一个共同的语法和他们每个人可以包括嵌套语句 -或者规则集或嵌套的规则。此外，它们都传达一种共同的语义-它们都链接某种类型的条件，该条件在任何时候都可以评估为true或false。如果条件评估为true，则将应用组中的所有语句。

trans-unit.source: Multiple-column Layout is closely related to Paged Media, in that each column box becomes a fragment, much like a printed page becomes a fragment of an overall document. Therefore the properties now defined in the CSS Fragmentation specification are required in order to control how content breaks between columns.
trans-unit.target: 多列布局与分页媒体密切相关，因为每个列框都变成一个片段，就像打印页面变成整个文档的一个片段一样。因此，现在需要CSS Fragmentation规范中定义的属性，以控制内容在列之间的分隔方式。

trans-unit.source: Multiple-column Layout, usually referred to as multicol, is a specification for laying out content into a set of column boxes much like columns in a newspaper. This guide explains how the specification works with some common use case examples.
trans-unit.target: 多栏布局(Multi-column Layout),通常被称为多栏布局(multicol),是一种规范,用于将内容布局成一组列框,就像报纸上的列一样。本指南通过一些常见的用例来解释该规范的工作原理。

trans-unit.source: Normal Flow is defined in the CSS 2.1 specification, which explains that any boxes in normal flow will be part of a formatting context. They can be either block or inline, but not both at once. We describe block-level boxes as participating in a block formatting context, and inline-level boxes as participating in an inline formatting context.
trans-unit.target: CSS 2.1规范中定义了Normal Flow，该规范解释了Normal Flow中的任何框都将成为格式化上下文的一部分。它们可以是块或内联，但不能同时存在。我们将块级框描述为参与块格式化上下文，而将行内框描述为参与内联格式化上下文。

trans-unit.source: Not all cubic Bézier curves are suitable as timing functions as not all are mathematical functions; i.e., curves that for a given abscissa have zero or one value. With P0 and P3 fixed as defined by CSS, a cubic Bézier curve is a function, and is therefore valid, if and only if the abscissas of P1 and P2 are both in the [0, 1] range.
trans-unit.target: 并不是所有的三次Bézier曲线都适合作为计时函数，因为并非都是数学函数 ; 即，对于给定的横坐标，曲线的值为零或一个。在CSS定义的P 0和P 3固定的情况下，三次贝塞尔曲线是一个函数，因此，当且仅当P 1和P 2的横坐标都在 [0, 1] 范围内时，该曲线才有效。

trans-unit.source: Note that sideways-rl and sideways-lr have support only in Firefox currently. There are also some known issues with regard to writing-mode and flexbox. You can see more information on browser support in the MDN documentation for writing-mode. However if you are planning on using writing modes in your layout, carefully testing the results is advisable — not least because it would be easy to make things hard to read!

trans-unit.source: Note that Firefox supports similar functionality through an older, prefixed pseudo-class — :-moz-focusring. See the :-moz-focusring page for more details.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，Firefox通过较早的带前缀伪类— :-moz-focusring 支持类似的功能。有关更多详细信息，请参见 :-moz-focusring 页面。

trans-unit.source: Note that Internet Explorer 11 does not support feature queries yet does support flexbox. If you decide the IE11 implementation is too buggy and you wish to serve it the fallback layout then you could use feature queries to serve flexbox rules only to those browsers with good flexbox support. Remember that if you want to include versions of browsers that had vendor-prefixed flexbox you would need to include the prefixed version in your feature query. The following feature query would include UC Browser, which supports feature queries and old flexbox syntax, prefixed:
trans-unit.target: 请注意，Internet Explorer 11不支持功能查询，但还支持flexbox。如果您认为IE11实施过于错误，并且希望为其提供后备布局，则可以使用功能查询仅向具有良好Flexbox支持的浏览器提供Flexbox规则。请记住，如果要包括具有供应商前缀的flexbox的浏览器版本，则需要在功能查询中包括前缀版本。以下功能查询将包括UC浏览器，该浏览器支持功能查询和带有前缀的旧flexbox语法：

trans-unit.source: Note that animations like this can cause the page to become wider than the browser window. To avoid this problem put the element to be animated in a container, and set overflow:hidden on the container.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这样的动画可能导致页面变得比浏览器窗口更宽。为避免此问题，请将要设置动画的元素放在容器中，然后在容器上设置 overflow :hidden 。

trans-unit.source: Note that any other scrolls, such as those performed by the user, are not affected by this property. When this property is specified on the root element, it applies to the viewport instead. This property specified on the body element will not propagate to the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，任何其他滚动，例如用户执行的滚动，都不受此属性的影响。在根元素上指定此属性后，它将应用于视口。在 body 元素上指定的此属性不会传播到视口。

trans-unit.source: Note that because of this, the box doesn't start with any animation effects in place, so it won't be animating.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,因为这个原因,盒子一开始并没有任何动画效果,所以不会有动画效果。

trans-unit.source: Note that column balancing is not supported by all browsers. Check that you are getting the sort of effect that you expect in the browsers you support.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,并非所有浏览器都支持列平衡。请检查您在您支持的浏览器中是否得到了您所期望的那种效果。

trans-unit.source: Note that currently browsers support this functionality as :matches(), or through an older, prefixed pseudo-class — :any(), including older versions of Chrome, Firefox, and Safari. :any() works in exactly the same way as :matches()/:is(), except that it requires vendor prefixes and doesn't support complex selectors.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当前浏览器以 :matches() 或通过较早的带前缀伪类— :any() 来支持此功能，包括较旧版本的Chrome，Firefox和Safari。 :any() 的工作方式与 :matches() / :is() 完全相同，不同的是它需要供应商前缀并且不支持复杂的选择器。

trans-unit.source: Note that currently the logical values for resize are only supported by Firefox.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,目前只有Firefox支持调整大小的逻辑值。

trans-unit.source: Note that images used in this way must be CORS compatible, otherwise shape-outside will act as if none had been given as the value, and you will get no shape.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，以这种方式使用的图像必须与CORS兼容，否则 shape-outside 的作用就像 none 值一样，并且您将不会得到任何形状。

trans-unit.source: Note that it's particularly not recommended to use a pixel dimension and an auto dimension with a <gradient>, because it's impossible to replicate rendering in versions of Firefox prior to 8, and in browsers not implementing Firefox 8's rendering, without knowing the exact size of the element whose background is being specified.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，特别不建议将像素尺寸和 auto 尺寸与 <gradient> 一起使用，因为在不知道Firefox 8确切尺寸的情况下，不可能在8之前的Firefox版本和未实现Firefox 8呈现的浏览器中复制呈现。指定其背景的元素。

trans-unit.source: Note that multipliers cannot be added and have all precedence over combinators.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,乘法器不能相加,且都优先于组合器。

trans-unit.source: Note that preventing an element from being the target of mouse events by using pointer-events does not necessarily mean that mouse event listeners on that element cannot or will not be triggered. If one of the element's children has pointer-events explicitly set to allow that child to be the target of mouse events, then any events targeting that child will pass through the parent as the event travels along the parent chain, and trigger event listeners on the parent as appropriate. Of course any mouse activity at a point on the screen that is covered by the parent but not by the child will not be caught by either the child or the parent (it will go "through" the parent and target whatever is underneath).
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是防止元件因使用被鼠标事件的目标 pointer-events 也并不一定意味着该元素的鼠标事件监听器不能或不会被触发。如果元素的子元素之一具有明确设置为允许的 pointer-events 该子对象将成为鼠标事件的目标，则当该事件沿父对象链传播时，以该子对象为目标的所有事件都将通过父对象，并在适当时触发父对象上的事件侦听器。当然，在屏幕上被父对象而不是孩子覆盖的某个点上的任何鼠标活动都不会被孩子或父对象捕获（它将“穿过”父对象并瞄准下面的任何对象）。

trans-unit.source: Note that some replaced elements, but not all, have intrinsic dimensions or a defined baseline, which is used by some CSS properties, such as vertical-align. Only replaced elements can ever have intrinsic dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，某些替换元素（但不是全部）具有内部尺寸或定义的基线，某些CSS属性（例如 vertical-align ）使用了基线。只有被替换的元素才能具有固有尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Note that stacking these pieces vertically will result in the non-fragmented rendering.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,垂直堆叠这些碎片将导致非碎片化渲染。

trans-unit.source: Note that text direction is usually defined within a document (e.g., with HTML's dir attribute) rather than through direct use of the direction property.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，文本方向通常是在文档中定义的（例如，使用HTML的 dir 属性），而不是通过直接使用 direction 属性来定义。

trans-unit.source: Note that the CSS 2.1 specification describes documents as being in a horizontal, top to bottom writing mode. For example, by describing vertical distance between block boxes. The behavior on block and inline elements is the same when working in a vertical writing mode, and we will explore this in a future guide on Flow Layout and Writing Modes.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,CSS 2.1规范对文档的描述是水平的,从上到下的书写模式。例如,通过描述块框之间的垂直距离。在垂直书写模式下工作时,块和内联元素上的行为是一样的,我们将在未来的流程布局和书写模式指南中探讨这个问题。

trans-unit.source: Note that the declaration defined in the user CSS, though having a greater specifity, is not chosen as the cascade algorithm is applied before the specifity algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,用户CSS中定义的声明虽然有较大的指定性,但由于级联算法应用在指定性算法之前,所以没有选择。

trans-unit.source: Note that the insertion caret is only one type of caret. For example, many browsers have a “navigation caret,” which acts similarly to an insertion caret but can be moved around in non-editable text. On the other hand, the mouse cursor image shown when hovering over text where the cursor property is auto, or when hovering over an element where the cursor property is text or vertical-text, though it sometimes looks like a caret, is not a caret (it’s a cursor).
trans-unit.target: 注意，插入插入符只是插入符的一种。例如，许多浏览器都具有“导航插入符”，其作用类似于插入插入符，但可以在不可编辑的文本中移动。另一方面，将鼠标悬停在 cursor 属性为 auto 的文本上，或将光标悬停在 cursor 属性为 text 或 vertical-text 的元素上时显示的鼠标光标图像，尽管有时看起来像是插入符号，但不是插入符号（这是一个游标）。

trans-unit.source: Note that the reversing is only happening in the inline, row direction. We start on the right then go onto the second line and again start from the right. We aren’t reversing in both directions, starting from the bottom coming up the container!
trans-unit.target: 请注意，反转仅在行内，行方向上发生。我们从右边开始，然后转到第二行，再从右边开始。从容器底部开始，我们不会双向扭转！

trans-unit.source: Note that the rule itself does not take up any space: a wide rule will not push the columns apart to make space for the rule. Instead, the rule overlays the gap.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,规则本身并不占用任何空间:宽规则不会将列推开,为规则腾出空间。相反,规则会覆盖空白。

trans-unit.source: Note that the star image is partially transparent and is layered over the cat image.

trans-unit.source: Note that the times are very close to, but not exactly, those expected given the timing established when the animation was configured. Note also that after the final iteration of the animation, the animationiteration event isn’t sent; instead, the animationend event is sent.

trans-unit.source: Note that the values row and row-reverse are affected by the directionality of the flex container. trans-unit.source: On a desktop computer, for example, the MouseEvent.clientX and MouseEvent.clientY properties indicate the position of the mouse cursor at the moment the event occurred, relative to the top-left corner of the browser window. The top-left corner of the window is always (0, 0), regardless of the content of the document or any scrolling that may have been done. In other words, scrolling the document will change the client coordinates of a given position within the document.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在台式计算机上， MouseEvent.clientX 和 MouseEvent.clientY 属性指示事件发生时鼠标光标相对于浏览器窗口左上角的位置。窗口的左上角始终为（0，0），而不管文档的内容或可能进行的任何滚动。换句话说，滚动文档将更改文档中给定位置的客户坐标。

trans-unit.source: On elements, always computes to normal. On ::before and ::after, if normal is specified, computes to none. Otherwise, for URI values, the absolute URI; for attr() values, the resulting string; for other keywords, as specified.
trans-unit.target: 在元素上，总是计算为 normal 。在 ::before 和 ::after 上，如果指定 normal ，则计算为 none 。否则，对于URI值，则为绝对URI；否则，为URI。对于 attr() 值，结果字符串；指定的其他关键字。

trans-unit.target: 在屏幕上，单位与CSS英寸，厘米或像素有关，而不是物理值。

trans-unit.target: 在 ::before 和 ::after 伪元素上，计算出的值为 none

trans-unit.source: On the cross axis align-self makes sense as we potentially have additional space in the flex container in that dimension, in which a single item can be moved to the start and end.
trans-unit.target: 在横轴上 align-self 是有意义的，因为我们可能会在弹性容器中在该维度上留出额外的空间，在其中可以将单个项目移动到起点和终点。

trans-unit.source: On the cross axis the row-gap property will create spacing between adjacent flex lines, therefore flex-wrap must also be set to wrap for this to have any effect.
trans-unit.target: 在横轴上， row-gap 属性将在相邻的折弯线之间创建间距，因此，还必须将 flex-wrap 设置为 wrap ，以使其生效。

trans-unit.source: On the inline axis, we can use justify-content to perform the same type of alignment that we used align-content for in the block axis.
trans-unit.target: 在内联轴上，我们可以使用 justify-content 来执行与在块轴中使用 align-content 相同的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: On the main axis Flexbox deals with our content as a group. The amount of space required to lay out the items is calculated, and the leftover space is then available for distribution. The justify-content property controls how that leftover space is used. Set justify-content: flex-end and the extra space is placed before the items, justify-content: space-around and it is placed either side of the item in that dimension, etc.
trans-unit.target: 在主轴上，Flexbox作为一个整体来处理我们的内容。计算出布置物品所需的空间量，然后剩余的空间可用于分配。该 justify-content 属性控制剩余空间的使用。设置 justify-content: flex-end 并在项目之前放置多余的空间， justify-content: space-around 并将其放置在该维度中项目的两侧，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: On the main axis, the column-gap property will create fixed size gaps between adjacent items.
trans-unit.target: 在主轴上， column-gap 属性将在相邻项目之间创建固定大小的间隙。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, if a true italicized version of the font family exists, we can include it in the src descriptor and specify the font style as italic, so that it is clear that the font is italicized. True italics use different glyphs and are a bit different from their upright counterparts, having some unique features and generally have a rounded and calligraphic quality. These fonts are specially created by font designers and are not artificially sloped.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，如果存在字体家族的真实斜体版本，则可以将其包含在 src 描述符中，并将字体样式指定为斜体，这样很显然字体是斜体的。真正的斜体使用不同的字形，并且与直立的斜体有些不同，它们具有一些独特的功能，并且通常具有圆形和书法的质量。这些字体是由字体设计师专门创建的，没有人为倾斜。

trans-unit.source: On the web, the default origin is the top-left corner of a given context (with positive y-coordinate values being below the origin). Note that this is unlike most mathematical models, where the origin is at the bottom-left corner, with positive y-coordinate values being above the origin.
trans-unit.target: 在网络上，默认的原点是顶给定情景的-left角落（正Y坐标值是原点下文）。请注意，这是不同于大多数的数学模型，其中原点在底部 -左拐角处，正y坐标值的原点上方。

trans-unit.source: Once again I can use feature queries to overwrite a layout that uses display: inline-block, and again I don’t need to overwrite everything. An item that is set to inline-block becomes a grid item, and so the behaviour of inline-block no longer applies. I have used the vertical-align property on my item when in the inline-block display mode, but this property does not apply to grid items and, therefore, is ignored once the item becomes a grid item:
trans-unit.target: 再一次，我可以使用功能查询来覆盖使用 display: inline-block 的布局，再次，我不需要覆盖所有内容。设置为 inline-block 的项目将成为网格项目，因此 inline-block 的行为不再适用。 inline-block 显示模式下，我在项目上使用了 vertical-align 属性，但是此属性不适用于网格项目，因此，一旦该项目成为网格项目，该属性将被忽略：

trans-unit.source: Once again it is the width on the item we need to address, and then any other properties we want to enhance. In this example I have again used grid-gap, rather than margins and negative margins to create my gutters.
trans-unit.target: 同样，它是我们需要处理的项目的宽度，然后是我们要增强的任何其他属性。在此示例中，我再次使用 grid-gap ，而不是使用边距和负边距来创建我的装订线。

trans-unit.source: Once again the Grid Inspector is useful to help us see how our layout has taken shape.
trans-unit.target: 网格检查器再次有助于我们了解布局的形状。

trans-unit.source: Once again the default is stretch, other than for items with an intrinsic aspect ratio. This means that by default, grid items will cover their grid area, unless you change that by setting alignment. The first item in the example demonstrates this default alignment:
trans-unit.target: 再次将默认值设置为 stretch ，但对于具有固有长宽比的项目除外。这意味着默认情况下，网格项目将覆盖其网格区域，除非您通过设置对齐方式进行更改。示例中的第一项演示了此默认对齐方式：

trans-unit.source: Once again the item no longer participates in the grid layout in terms of sizing or when other items are auto-placed.
trans-unit.target: 再次,该项目不再参与网格布局的大小或其他项目自动放置时。

trans-unit.source: Once again we can switch our flex-direction to column in order to see how this property behaves when we are working by column. As before, we need enough space in the cross axis to have some free space after displaying all of the items.
trans-unit.target: 再一次，我们可以将 flex-direction 切换到 column ，以查看按列工作时此属性的行为。和以前一样，在显示所有项目后，我们需要在横轴上有足够的空间以具有一些可用空间。

trans-unit.source: Once again, the grid highlighter is helpful to show us how the grid we have placed our items on works.
trans-unit.target: 再次,网格高亮显示器很有帮助,可以向我们展示我们放置物品的网格是如何工作的。

trans-unit.source: Once an inline-block item becomes a flex item, it is blockified and so behavior of display: inline-block like preserving white space between items no longer applies.
trans-unit.target: 一旦 inline-block 项目变为弹性项目，就对其进行 block ，因此 display: inline-block 行为：内联块（如保留项目之间的空白）不再适用。

trans-unit.source: Once boxes are generated, the CSS engine needs to position them on the layout. To do that, it uses one of the following algorithms:
trans-unit.target: 一旦生成了盒子,CSS引擎就需要在布局上定位它们。要做到这一点,它使用以下算法之一。

trans-unit.source: Once forced breaks have been applied, soft breaks may be added if needed, but not on element boundaries that resolve in a corresponding avoid value.
trans-unit.target: 一旦应用了强制中断，就可以在需要时添加软中断，但不能在解析为相应 avoid 值的元素边界上添加。

trans-unit.source: Once it has been rendered, the layout can no longer be updated. Example: documents printed on paper.
trans-unit.target: 一旦渲染完毕,就不能再更新布局。例如:打印在纸上的文档。

trans-unit.source: Once the lines have names, we can use the name to place the item rather than the line number.
trans-unit.target: 一旦行号有了名称,我们就可以用名称而不是行号来放置项目。

trans-unit.source: Once this code is finished running, the value of animation will be false if CSS animation support isn't available, or it will be true. If it is true then both the animation property name and the keyframe prefix will be the right ones. So if you use a new Firefox, the property will be MozAnimation and the keyframe prefix -moz- and with Chrome it'll be WebkitAnimation and -webkit-. Notice browsers don't make it easy with the switching between camelCase and hyphen-ation.
trans-unit.target: 此代码运行完毕后，如果CSS动画支持不可用，animation 的值将为 false ，否则将为 true 。如果为 true ,则动画属性名称和关键帧前缀都将是正确的。因此，如果您使用新的Firefox，则该属性将为 MozAnimation ，关键帧前缀 -moz- ,而对于Chrome，它将为 WebkitAnimation 和 -webkit- 。请注意，浏览器无法在camelCase和连字符之间进行切换。

trans-unit.source: Once we begin dealing with logical, rather than physical properties, we stop seeing the world as left to right, and top to bottom. We need a new reference point, and this is where understanding the block and inline axes, that we met previously in the guide to alignment, becomes very useful. If you can start to see layout in terms of block and inline, the way things work in grid start to make a lot more sense.
trans-unit.target: 一旦开始处理逻辑属性，而不是物理属性，我们便不再从左到右，从上到下看到世界。我们需要一个新的参考点，在这里，我们在对齐指南中先前遇到的理解块轴和内联轴变得非常有用。如果您可以从块和内联的角度开始看到布局，那么网格中的工作方式就会变得更加有意义。

trans-unit.source: Once you are working in writing modes other than horizontal-tb many of the properties and values that are mapped to the physical dimensions of the screen seem strange. For example, if you give a box a width of 100px, in horizontal-tb that would control the size in the inline direction. In vertical-lr it controls the size in the block direction because it does not rotate with the text.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您在除 horizontal-tb 以外的其他书写模式下工作，映射到屏幕物理尺寸的许多属性和值似乎很奇怪。例如，如果您给框设置了100px的宽度，则为 horizontal-tb ，它将控制内联方向的大小。在 vertical-lr 中,它控制块方向的大小，因为它不会随文本一起旋转。

trans-unit.source: Once you have created the grid you can place items onto it. As we have multiple lines named col-start if you place an item to start after line col-start grid uses the first line named col-start, in our case that will be the far left line. To address another line use the name, plus the number for that line. To place our item from the first line named col-start to the 5th, we can use:

trans-unit.source: Once you have done this, you can work on the element in the 3D space.
trans-unit.target: 一旦你完成了这些工作,你就可以在三维空间中对元素进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Once you’ve configured the animation’s timing, you need to define the appearance of the animation. This is done by establishing two or more keyframes using the @keyframes at-rule. Each keyframe describes how the animated element should render at a given time during the animation sequence.
trans-unit.target: 配置了动画的时间后，您需要定义动画的外观。这是通过使用 @keyframes 规则建立两个或更多关键帧来完成的。每个关键帧描述动画元素在动画序列中给定时间应如何呈现。

trans-unit.source: Once you've created your media query list, you can check the result of the query by looking at the value of its matches property:
trans-unit.target: 创建媒体查询列表后，可以通过查看其 matches 属性的值来检查查询结果：

trans-unit.source: One box uses physical properties and the other logical properties. Try changing the direction property to rtl to cause the boxes to display in a right-to-left direction, the margins on the first box will stay in the same place, while the margins on the inline dimension of the second box will switch.
trans-unit.target: 一个框使用物理属性，其他框使用逻辑属性。尝试将 direction 属性更改为 rtl ,以使框以从右到左的方向显示，第一个框的边距将保持在同一位置，而第二个框的内联尺寸的边距将切换。

trans-unit.source: One issue with multicol on the web is that, if your columns are taller than the viewport, the reader will need to scroll up and down to read, which is not good user experience. One way to avoid this is to only apply the column properties if you know you have enough height.
trans-unit.target: web上使用multicol的一个问题是,如果你的列比视口高,读者需要上下滚动才能阅读,这不是很好的用户体验。避免这种情况的一个方法是,只有当你知道你有足够的高度时才应用列属性。

trans-unit.target: 关键字值之一： cyclic ， numeric ， alphabetic ， symbolic ， additive 或 fixed 。

trans-unit.target: 关键字值 top ， left ， bottom ， right 之一。如果在此处给出 left 或 right ，则定义X，另一个给定的值定义Y。如果给定 top 或 bottom ，则定义Y，另一个值定义X。

trans-unit.source: One of the more common use cases for OpenType features is proper small caps. These are capital letters sized to fit better amongst lower case letters and are generally used for acronyms and abbreviations.
trans-unit.target: OpenType功能的一个比较常见的使用情况是适当的小写字母。这些大写字母的大小是为了更好地适应小写字母,通常用于缩写和缩略语。

trans-unit.source: One of the most common style changes made to lists is a change in the indentation distance—that is, how far the list items are pushed over to the right. This often leads to frustration, because what works in one browser often doesn't have the same effect in another. For example, if you declare that lists have no left margin, they move over in Internet Explorer, but sit stubbornly in place in Gecko-based browsers.This article will help you understand the problems that can occur and how to avoid them.
trans-unit.target: 对列表进行的最常见的样式更改之一是缩进距离的更改，即缩进列表项到右侧的距离。这通常会导致挫败感，因为在一种浏览器中正常工作的结果在另一种浏览器中往往没有相同的效果。例如，如果您声明列表没有左页边距，它们将在Internet Explorer中移动，但是在基于Gecko的浏览器中固执地坐在原处。本文将帮助您了解可能出现的问题以及如何避免它们。

trans-unit.source: One of the reasons that flexbox quickly caught the interest of web developers is that it brought proper alignment capabilities to the web for the first time. It enabled proper vertical alignment, so we can at last easily centre a box. In this guide, we will take a thorough look at how the alignment and justification properties work in Flexbox.
trans-unit.target: flexbox迅速引起网页开发者的兴趣,原因之一是它第一次为网页带来了正确的对齐功能。它实现了适当的垂直对齐,所以我们终于可以轻松地将一个盒子居中。在本指南中,我们将全面了解Flexbox中的对齐和正当性属性是如何工作的。

trans-unit.source: Only CSS declarations, that is property/value pairs, participate in the cascade. This means that at-rules containing entities other than declarations, such as a @font-face rule containing descriptors, don't participate in the cascade. In these cases, only the at-rule as a whole participates in the cascade: here, the @font-face identified by its font-family descriptor. If several @font-face rules with the same descriptor are defined, only the most appropriate @font-face, as a whole, is considered.
trans-unit.target: 只有CSS声明（即属性/值对）参与级联。这意味着包含除声明以外的实体的规则（例如，包含描述符的 @font-face 规则）不参与级联。在这些情况下，只有整个规则才参与级联：这里，由其 font-family 描述符标识的 @font-face 。如果定义了多个具有相同描述符的 @font-face 规则，则整体上仅考虑最合适的 @font-face 。

trans-unit.source: Only a few elements (<li> and <summary>) have a default value of display: list-item. Moreover, because this property is inherited, it can be set on a parent element (commonly <ol> or <ul>) to make it apply to all list items.

trans-unit.source: Only the individual properties values can inherit. As missing values are replaced by their initial value, it is impossible to allow inheritance of individual properties by omitting them. The keyword inherit can be applied to a property, but only as a whole, not as a keyword for one value or another. That means that the only way to make some specific value to be inherited is to use the longhand property with the keyword inherit.
trans-unit.target: 仅单个属性值可以继承。由于缺失值被其初始值替代，因此不可能通过忽略它们来继承单个属性。关键字 inherit 可以应用于属性，但只能应用于整个属性，不能应用于一个值或另一个值的关键字。这意味着要使某些特定值被继承的唯一方法是将longhand属性与关键字 inherit 。

trans-unit.source: Only the subset of CSS properties that apply to the ::first-line pseudo-element can be used in a rule using ::placeholder in its selector.
trans-unit.target: 在规则中使用 ::placeholder 的规则中，仅适用于 ::first-line 伪元素的CSS属性的子集。

trans-unit.source: Opera 9.5 to 10.1 adheres to the old, reverse painting order (in CSS2, the first specified shadow is on the bottom).
trans-unit.target: Opera 9.5到10.1坚持旧的、反向的绘画顺序(在CSS2中,第一个指定的阴影在底部)。

trans-unit.source: Opera 9.5's computation of the background positioning area is incorrect for fixed backgrounds. Opera 9.5 also interprets the two-value form as a horizontal scaling factor and, from appearances, a vertical clipping dimension. This has been fixed in Opera 10.
trans-unit.target: Opera 9.5对固定背景的背景定位区域的计算是不正确的。Opera 9.5还将两值形式解释为水平缩放因子,从外观上看,解释为垂直剪裁维度。这一点在Opera 10中已经得到了修正。

trans-unit.source: Optional x- and y-coordinates. Two unitless nonnegative numbers less than 32.
trans-unit.target: 可选的x-坐标和y-坐标。小于32的两个无单位非负数。

trans-unit.source: Optional. The color of the shadow. It can be specified either before or after the offset values. If unspecified, the color's value is left up to the user agent, so when consistency across browsers is desired you should define it explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 可选。阴影的颜色。它可以在偏移值之前或之后指定。如果没有指定,颜色的值由用户代理决定,所以当需要在不同的浏览器中保持一致时,你应该明确地定义它。

trans-unit.source: Optional. This is a <length> value. The higher the value, the bigger the blur; the shadow becomes wider and lighter. If not specified, it defaults to 0.
trans-unit.target: 可选的。这是一个 <length> 值。值越高，模糊越大。阴影变宽和变亮。如果未指定，则默认为 0 。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, a <color> value.
trans-unit.target: （可选）一个 <color> 值。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, it may be preceded by a single + or - sign. Positive numbers represent clockwise angles, while negative numbers represent counterclockwise angles. For static properties of a given unit, any angle can be represented by various equivilent values. For example, 90deg equals -270deg, and 1turn equals 4turn. For dynamic properties, like when applying an animation or transition, the effect will nevertheless be different.
trans-unit.target: （可选）可以在其前面加一个 + 或 - 号。正数表示顺时针角度，而负数表示逆时针角度。对于给定单元的静态属性，任何角度都可以由各种等效值表示。例如， 90deg 等于 -270deg ， 1turn 等于 4turn 。对于动态属性，例如在应用 animation 或 transition ，效果将有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, the inset keyword.
trans-unit.target: （可选） inset 关键字。

trans-unit.source: Other than in Internet Explorer, CSS Grid Layout is unprefixed in Safari, Chrome, Opera, Firefox and Edge. Support for all the properties and values detailed in these guides is interoperable across browsers. This means that if you write some Grid Layout code in Firefox, it should work in the same way in Chrome. This is no longer an experimental specification, and you are safe to use it in production.
trans-unit.target: 除了在Internet Explorer中,CSS Grid Layout在Safari、Chrome、Opera、Firefox和Edge中是不固定的。对这些指南中详述的所有属性和值的支持在各浏览器中都是可以互操作的。这意味着,如果你在Firefox中写了一些Grid Layout代码,它在Chrome中也应该以同样的方式工作。这不再是一个实验性的规范,你可以安全地在生产中使用它。

trans-unit.source: Other than the physical values of left and right, which relate to physical attributes of the screen, all of the other values are logical values and relate to the writing mode of the content.
trans-unit.target: 除了与屏幕的物理属性有关的 left 和 right 的物理值之外，所有其他值都是逻辑值，并且与内容的书写方式有关。

trans-unit.target: 否则，将其视为已与 <custom-ident> 一起指定了整数 1 。

trans-unit.source: Our callback cleverly calls requestAnimationFrame() a second time! This time, the callback is run before the next repaint, which is after the style recomputation has occurred. This callback adds the "changing" class back onto the box, so that the repaint will start the animation once again.
trans-unit.target: 我们的回调巧妙地再次调用 requestAnimationFrame() ！这次，在下一次重画之前（即样式重新计算之后）运行回调。该回调将 "changing" 类添加回该框，以便重新绘制将再次启动动画。

trans-unit.source: Our circle therefore accepts one radius value, which may be a length, a percentage or the closest-side or farthest side keyword then optionally the keyword at followed by a position value.
trans-unit.target: 因此，我们的圆接受一个半径值，该半径值可以是长度，百分比或最近边或最远边关键字，然后可以选择关键字at后跟位置值。

trans-unit.source: Our grid is a two-column track grid, with the column for the image sized at 1fr and the text 3fr. If you wanted a fixed width image area, then you could set the image column as a pixel width, and assign the text area 1fr. A single column track of 1fr would then take up the rest of the space.
trans-unit.target: 我们的网格是一个两列的轨道网格，图像的列大小为 1fr ，文本为 3fr 。如果需要固定宽度的图像区域，则可以将图像列设置为像素宽度，并分配文本区域 1fr 。这样一列 1fr 的轨道将占用其余空间。

trans-unit.source: Our main code sets up the event handlers on the inner box by calling addEventListener() for each of the types mouseenter, mousemove, and mouseleave.
trans-unit.target: 我们的主要代码通过为 mouseenter ， mousemove 和 mouseleave 中的每种类型调用 addEventListener() 来在内部框上设置事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Our new layout methods give us the ability to use these logical values to place items, however, as soon as we start to combine them with the physical properties used for margins and padding, we need to remember that those physical properties will not change according to writing mode.
trans-unit.target: 我们新的布局方法让我们有能力使用这些逻辑值来放置项目,然而,当我们开始将它们与用于页边距和padding的物理属性相结合时,我们需要记住,这些物理属性不会根据书写模式而改变。

trans-unit.source: Our shorthand would look like the following code, with no forward slash and second value for the items spanning one track only.

trans-unit.source: Our three properties control the following aspects of a flex item's flexibility:

trans-unit.source: Our understanding of how flex-grow works with flex-basis allows us to have further control over our individual item sizes by assigning items different flex-grow factors. If we keep our flex-basis at 0 so all of the space can be distributed, we could assign each of the three flex items a different flex-grow factor. In the example below I am using the following values:
trans-unit.target: 我们对 flex-grow 如何与 flex-basis 一起工作的理解使我们可以通过为项目分配不同的 flex-grow 因子来进一步控制单个项目的大小。如果我们将 flex-basis 保持为 0 ,以便可以分配所有空间，则可以为三个flex项目中的每一个分配不同的 flex-grow 因子。在下面的示例中，我使用以下值：

trans-unit.source: Out of flow items create a new Block Formatting Context (BFC) and therefore everything inside them can be seen as a mini layout, separate from the rest of the page. The root element therefore is out of flow, as the container for everything in our document, and establishes the Block Formatting Context for the document.
trans-unit.target: Out of flow项目创建了一个新的块格式化上下文(BFC),因此,它们里面的所有内容都可以被看作是一个迷你布局,与页面的其他部分分开。因此,根元素是流出的,作为文档中所有内容的容器,并为文档建立了块格式化上下文。

trans-unit.source: Outlines never take up space, as they are drawn outside of an element's content.
trans-unit.target: 轮廓从不占用空间,因为它们是在元素的内容之外绘制的。

trans-unit.source: Over the last three guides you have discovered that there are a lot of different ways to place items using grid. This can seem a little bit overcomplicated at first, but remember you don’t need to use all of them. In practice I find that for straightforward layouts, using named template areas works well, it gives that nice visual representation of what your layout looks like, and it is then easy to move things around on the grid.
trans-unit.target: 在最后三本指南中，您发现使用网格放置项目的方式有很多。乍一看，这似乎有些复杂，但是请记住您并不需要全部使用它们。在实践中，我发现对于简单的布局，使用命名模板区域效果很好，可以很好地直观显示布局外观，然后轻松地在网格上移动内容。

trans-unit.source: Placeholder text typically has a lighter color treatment to indicate that it is a suggestion for what kind of input will be valid, and is not actual input of any kind.
trans-unit.target: 占位符文本通常有一个浅色的处理,以表明它是对什么样的输入有效的建议,而不是任何形式的实际输入。

trans-unit.source: Placeholder text will appear with the same styling as user-entered text content when rendered in Windows High Contrast Mode. This will make it difficult for some people to determine which content has been entered, and which content is placeholder text.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows高对比度模式下呈现时，占位符文本的样式与用户输入的文本内容相同。这将使某些人难以确定已经输入了哪些内容，以及哪些内容是占位符文本。

trans-unit.source: Placeholder text with sufficient color contrast may be interpreted as entered input. Placeholder text will also disappear when a person enters content into an <input> element. Both of these circumstances can interfere with successful form completion, especially for people with cognitive concerns.
trans-unit.target: 具有足够色彩对比度的占位符文本可以解释为输入的输入。当人们将内容 <input> 元素时，占位符文本也将消失。这两种情况都会影响成功完成表单，特别是对于有认知问题的人。

trans-unit.source: Placeholders are not a replacement for the <label> element. Without a label that has been programmatically associated with an input using a combination of the for and id attributes, assistive technology such as screen readers cannot parse <input> elements.
trans-unit.target: 占位符不能代替 <label> 元素。如果没有使用 for 和 id 属性的组合将标签与输入编程关联的标签，则辅助技术（例如屏幕阅读器）将无法解析 <input> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Pseudo-classes let you apply a style to an element not only in relation to the content of the document tree, but also in relation to external factors like the history of the navigator (:visited, for example), the status of its content (like :checked on certain form elements), or the position of the mouse (like :hover, which lets you know if the mouse is over an element or not).
trans-unit.target: 伪类使您不仅可以将样式应用于文档树的内容，还可以将其应用于外部因素，例如导航器的历史记录（例如 :visited ），其内容的状态（如 :checked 在某些表单元素上选中），或鼠标的位置（如 :hover ，它可以让您知道鼠标是否在元素上）。

trans-unit.source: Put in simpler terms, they're elements whose contents are not affected by the current document's styles. The position of the replaced element can be affected using CSS, but not the contents of the replaced element itself. Some replaced elements, such as <iframe> elements, may have stylesheets of their own, but they don't inherit the styles of the parent document.
trans-unit.target: 简而言之，它们是内容不受当前文档样式影响的元素。可以使用CSS影响替换元素的位置，但替换元素本身的内容不受影响。某些替换的元素（例如 <iframe> 元素）可能具有自己的样式表，但它们不继承父文档的样式。

trans-unit.source: Rather than setting the end line number, I have chosen to say how many tracks this element should span, using the span keyword. I like this approach as when working with a multiple-column layout system we usually think of blocks in terms of the number of tracks of the grid they span, and adjust that for different breakpoints. To see how the blocks align themselves to the tracks, use the Firefox Grid Inspector. It clearly demonstrates how our items are placed.
trans-unit.target: 我没有设置结束行号，而是选择了使用 span 关键字来说明此元素应跨越多少条轨道。我喜欢这种方法，因为在使用多列布局系统时，我们通常根据它们跨越的网格的轨道数来考虑块，并针对不同的断点进行调整。要查看块如何与轨道对齐，请使用Firefox Grid Inspector。它清楚地说明了我们的物品放置方式。

trans-unit.source: Registered axes are simply those that are most frequently encountered, and common enough that the authors of the specification felt it was worth standardizing. The five currently registered axes are weight, width, slant, italic, and optical size. The W3C has undertaken mapping them to existing CSS attributes, and in one case introduced a new one, which you'll see below.
trans-unit.target: 注册轴是指那些最经常遇到的,并且常见的,以至于规范的作者认为值得标准化的轴。目前注册的五个轴是重量、宽度、斜度、斜体和光学尺寸。W3C已经着手将它们映射到现有的CSS属性上,有一次还引入了一个新的属性,你会在下面看到。

trans-unit.source: Registered axes are the most commonly encountered — common enough that the authors of the specification felt they were worth standardizing. Note that this doesn't mean that the author has to include all of these in their font.
trans-unit.target: 配准轴是最常见的轴-足够通用，以至于规范作者认为它们值得标准化。注意，这并不意味着作者必须将所有这些都包括在其字体中。

trans-unit.source: Relative lengths represent a measurement in terms of some other distance. Depending on the unit, this can be the size of a specific character, the line height, or the size of the viewport.

trans-unit.source: Relative to the font size of the element itself. The computed value is this <percentage> multiplied by the element's computed font size. Percentage values may produce unexpected results (see the second example below).
trans-unit.target: 相对于元素本身的字体大小。计算值是该 <percentage> 乘以元素的计算字体大小。百分比值可能会产生意外结果（请参见下面的第二个示例）。

trans-unit.source: Relative-size keywords. The font will be larger or smaller relative to the parent element's font size, roughly by the ratio used to separate the absolute-size keywords above.
trans-unit.target: 相对大小的关键字。字体相对于父元素的字体大小会变大或变小,大致是按照上面用来分隔绝对大小关键字的比例。

trans-unit.source: Relatively positioned elements are offset a given amount from their normal position within the document, but without the offset affecting other elements. In the example below, note how the other elements are placed as if "Two" were taking up the space of its normal location.
trans-unit.target: 相对定位的元素在文档中的正常位置会有一定的偏移,但不会影响其他元素。在下面的例子中,请注意其他元素是如何放置的,就像 "二 "占据了其正常位置的空间一样。

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: Remarks

trans-unit.source: Remember that the start line relates to writing modes. The row-related examples above demonstrate how row and row-reverse work in a left-to-right language such as English. If you were working in a right-to-left language like Arabic then row would start on the right, row-reverse on the left.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，起始线与书写模式有关。上面与行相关的示例说明了 row 和 row-reverse 如何以从左到右的语言（例如英语）工作。如果您使用的是从右到左的语言（如阿拉伯语），则 row 从右开始，而 row-reverse 则从左开始。

trans-unit.source: Remember that with all of these alignment methods, the values of flex-start and flex-end are writing mode-aware. If the value of justify-content is start and the writing mode is left-to-right as in English, the items will line up starting at the left side of the container.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，使用所有这些对齐方法时， flex-start 和 flex-end 的值都在感知模式。如果 justify-content 的值是 start 并且书写模式是从左到右（如英语一样），则这些项将从容器的左侧开始排列。

trans-unit.source: Remember that you can use any positive value here. It is the ratio between one item and the others that matters. You can use large numbers, or decimals — it is up to you. To test that out change the values assigned in the above example to .25, .25, and .50 — you should see the same result.
trans-unit.target: 请记住，您可以在此处使用任何正值。重要的是一项与另一项之间的比率。您可以使用大数或小数-由您决定。要测试将上面示例中分配的值更改为 .25 ， .25 和 .50 ，您应该看到相同的结果。

trans-unit.source: Remember this behaviour and what effects min-content and max-content have as we explore flex-grow and flex-shrink later in this article.
trans-unit.target: 记住这种行为以及 min-content 和 max-content 会在本文后面探讨 flex-grow 和 flex-shrink 产生什么影响。

trans-unit.source: Remember, though, that in so doing, you'll have the bullets hanging outside the list and its parent element. If the parent is the body, there's a strong chance your bullets will be completely outside the browser window, and thus will not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 但是请记住，这样做的话，子弹将挂在列表及其父元素的外部。如果父母是 body ，则很有可能您的子弹完全位于浏览器窗口之外，因此将不可见。

trans-unit.source: Remove display: flex to see the fallback behavior. You'll see white space added between the items, which is what happens when using display: inine-block as it prefers white space like other inline items.
trans-unit.target: 移除 display: flex 以查看后备行为。您会看到在项目之间添加了空格，这是在使用 display: inine-block 时发生的情况，因为它像其他嵌入式项目一样喜欢空白。

trans-unit.target: 将 <identifier> 重命名为 <custom-ident> 。将其用法添加到新的 counter-set 属性。

trans-unit.source: Renames <identifier> to <custom-ident>. Makes it a pseudo-type and forbids the use of excluded values.
trans-unit.target: 将 <identifier> 重命名为 <custom-ident> 。将其设置为伪类型，并禁止使用排除的值。

trans-unit.source: Renames it the "next-sibling" combinator.
trans-unit.target: 将其重新命名为 "下同 "组合体。

trans-unit.source: Renames it the "subsequent-sibling" combinator.
trans-unit.target: 将其重新命名为 "后续-同位素 "组合器。

trans-unit.source: Render this element at its normal size.
trans-unit.target: 以正常大小渲染该元素。

trans-unit.source: Repeat notation can be used for a part of the track listing. In this next example I have created a grid with an initial 20-pixel track, then a repeating section of 6 1fr tracks then a final 20-pixel track.
trans-unit.target: 重复符号可用于部分曲目列表。在下一个示例中，我创建了一个网格，该网格具有初始20像素的轨道，然后是6个 1fr 轨道的重复部分，最后是20像素的轨道。

trans-unit.source: Repeat notation takes the track listing, and uses it to create a repeating pattern of tracks. In this next example, my grid will consist of 10 tracks, a 1fr track, and then followed by a 2fr track. This pattern will be repeated five times.
trans-unit.target: 重复表示法获取曲目列表，并使用它来创建曲目的重复模式。在下一个示例中，我的网格将包含10条轨道， 1fr 轨道，然后是 2fr 轨道。此模式将重复五次。

trans-unit.target: 重复梯度

trans-unit.target: 重复的横条

trans-unit.source: Repeating linear gradients
trans-unit.target: 重复的线性梯度

trans-unit.source: Repeating radial gradients
trans-unit.target: 重复的径向梯度

trans-unit.source: Repeats a gradient as much as necessary to fill the entire element. Generated with the repeating-linear-gradient() and repeating-radial-gradient() functions.
trans-unit.target: 尽可能重复一次渐变以填充整个元素。用 repeating-linear-gradient() 和 repeating-radial-gradient() 函数生成。

trans-unit.source: Replaced content, as when combining content with a pseudo-element (::after or ::before)
trans-unit.target: 替换的内容，如将 content 与伪元素（ ::after 或 ::before ）组合在一起时

trans-unit.source: Replaced element
trans-unit.target: 被替换的要素

trans-unit.source: Replaced elements
trans-unit.target: 被替换的要素

trans-unit.source: Replaced elements such as images will not change their orientation based on the writing-mode property. However, replaced elements such as form controls which include text, should match the writing mode in use.
trans-unit.target: 替换的元素（例如图像）将不会根据 writing-mode 属性更改其方向。但是，替换后的元素（例如包含文本的表单控件）应与使用中的书写模式匹配。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the previous values with a <spacing-limit> value that defines the same thing, plus the <percentage> value. Allows up to three values describing the optimum, minimum, and maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 用定义同一事物的 <spacing-limit> 值加上 <percentage> 值替换以前的值。最多允许三个值描述最佳值，最小值和最大值。

trans-unit.source: Represents a frequency in hertz. Examples: 0Hz, 1500Hz, 10000Hz.
trans-unit.target: 代表以赫兹为单位的频率。例如： 0Hz ， 1500Hz ， 10000Hz 。

trans-unit.source: Represents a frequency in kilohertz. Examples: 0kHz, 1.5kHz, 10kHz.
trans-unit.target: 表示频率，以千赫兹为单位。示例： 0kHz ， 1.5kHz ， 10kHz 。

trans-unit.source: Represents a repeated fragment of the track list, allowing a large number of columns that exhibit a recurring pattern to be written in a more compact form.
trans-unit.target: 表示轨迹列表的重复片段,允许将大量表现出重复模式的列以更紧凑的形式写入。

trans-unit.source: Represents a repeated fragment of the track list, allowing a large number of rows that exhibit a recurring pattern to be written in a more compact form.
trans-unit.target: 表示轨迹列表的重复片段,允许将大量表现出重复模式的行以更紧凑的形式写入。

trans-unit.source: Represents a symbol used within the counter system. This must be one of the following data types:
trans-unit.target: 代表计数器系统内使用的一个符号。必须是下列数据类型之一:

trans-unit.source: Represents a time in milliseconds. Examples: 0ms, 150.25ms, -60000ms.
trans-unit.target: 表示时间（以毫秒为单位）。示例： 0ms ， 150.25ms ， -60000ms 。

trans-unit.source: Represents a time in seconds. Examples: 0s, 1.5s, -60s.
trans-unit.target: 表示时间（以秒为单位）。例如： 0s ， 1.5s ， -60s 。

trans-unit.source: Represents an angle in degrees. One full circle is 360deg. Examples: 0deg, 90deg, 14.23deg.
trans-unit.target: 以度为单位表示角度。一整圈是 360deg 。示例： 0deg ， 90deg ， 14.23deg 。

trans-unit.source: Represents an angle in gradians. One full circle is 400grad. Examples: 0grad, 100grad, 38.8grad.
trans-unit.target: 用梯度表示角度。一个完整的圆圈是 400grad 。示例： 0grad ， 100grad ， 38.8grad 。

trans-unit.source: Represents an angle in radians. One full circle is 2π radians which approximates to 6.2832rad. 1rad is 180/π degrees. Examples: 0rad, 1.0708rad, 6.2832rad.
trans-unit.target: 用弧度表示角度。一个完整的圆是2π弧度，大约为 6.2832rad 。 1rad 是180 /π度。示例： 0rad ， 1.0708rad ， 6.2832rad 。

trans-unit.source: Represents an angle in a number of turns. One full circle is 1turn. Examples: 0turn, 0.25turn, 1.2turn.
trans-unit.target: 表示转数的角度。一个整圈是 1turn 。示例： 0turn ， 0.25turn ， 1.2turn 。

trans-unit.source: Represents an edge offset as a percentage of the source image's size: the width of the image for horizontal offsets, the height for vertical offsets.
trans-unit.target: 表示边缘偏移量占源图像大小的百分比:水平偏移量为图像的宽度,垂直偏移量为高度。

trans-unit.source: Represents an edge offset in pixels for raster images and coordinates for vector images. For vector images, the number is relative to the element's size, not the size of the source image, so percentages are generally preferable in these cases.
trans-unit.target: 表示光栅图像的边缘偏移量（像素）和矢量图像的坐标。对于矢量图像，数字是相对于元素的大小，而不是源图像的大小，因此在这些情况下，通常最好使用百分比。

trans-unit.source: Represents elements 4, 7, 10, 13, etc., counting from the end.
trans-unit.target: 代表元素4、7、10、13等,从尾数开始计算。

trans-unit.source: Represents elements 5, 10, 15, etc., counting from the end.
trans-unit.target: 代表元素5、10、15等,从尾数开始计算。

trans-unit.source: Represents elements 4 [=(3×0)+4], 7 [=(3×1)+4], 10 [=(3×2)+4], 13 [=(3×3)+4], etc.
trans-unit.target: 表示元素4 [=（3×0）+4]，7 [=（3×1）+4]，10 [=（3×2）+4]，13 [=（3×3）+4]，等等

trans-unit.source: Represents elements 5 [=5×1], 10 [=5×2], 15 [=5×3], etc.
trans-unit.target: 表示元素5 [= 5×1]，10 [= 5×2]，15 [= 5×3] 等。

trans-unit.source: Represents elements whose numeric position in a series of siblings is even: 2, 4, 6, etc.
trans-unit.target: 表示在一系列兄弟姐妹中数字位置为偶数的元素:2、4、6等。

trans-unit.source: Represents elements whose numeric position in a series of siblings is even: 2, 4, 6, etc., counting from the end.
trans-unit.target: 表示在一系列兄弟姐妹中数字位置为偶数的元素:2、4、6等,从末尾开始计算。

trans-unit.source: Represents elements whose numeric position in a series of siblings is odd: 1, 3, 5, etc.
trans-unit.target: 表示在一系列兄弟姐妹中数字位置为奇数的元素:1、3、5等。

trans-unit.source: Represents elements whose numeric position in a series of siblings is odd: 1, 3, 5, etc., counting from the end.
trans-unit.target: 表示在一系列兄弟姐妹中数字位置为奇数的元素:1、3、5等,从末尾开始计算。

trans-unit.source: Represents elements whose numeric position in a series of siblings matches the pattern An+B, for every positive integer or zero value of n. The index of the first element is 1. The values A and B must both be <integer>s.
trans-unit.target: 表示对于 n 的每个正整数或零值，其在同级系列中的数字位置与模式 An+B 匹配的元素。第一个元素的索引为 1 。值 A 和 B 必须都为 <integer> 。

trans-unit.source: Represents elements whose numeric position in a series of siblings matches the pattern An+B, for every positive integer or zero value of n. The index of the first element, counting from the end, is 1. The values A and B must both be <integer>s.
trans-unit.target: 表示对于 n 的每个正整数或零值，其在同级系列中的数字位置与模式 An+B 匹配的元素。从结尾算起，第一个元素的索引为 1 。值 A 和 B 必须都为 <integer> 。

trans-unit.source: Represents elements with an attribute name of attr whose value can be exactly value or can begin with value immediately followed by a hyphen, - (U+002D). It is often used for language subcode matches.
trans-unit.target: 表示属性名称为attr的元素，其值可以完全是value或可以以value开头，后跟连字符 - （U + 002D）。它通常用于语言子代码匹配。

trans-unit.source: Represents elements with an attribute name of attr whose value contains at least one occurrence of value within the string.
trans-unit.target: 表示属性名称为attr的元素，其值包含至少一个在字符串中出现的值。

trans-unit.source: Represents elements with an attribute name of attr whose value is a whitespace-separated list of words, one of which is exactly value.
trans-unit.target: 表示属性名称为attr的元素，其值是用空格分隔的单词列表，其中之一就是value。

trans-unit.source: Represents elements with an attribute name of attr whose value is exactly value.
trans-unit.target: 表示属性名称为attr的元素，其值恰好是value。

trans-unit.source: Represents elements with an attribute name of attr whose value is prefixed (preceded) by value.
trans-unit.target: 代表具有的属性名称元素ATTR，其值由前缀（前）值。

trans-unit.source: Represents elements with an attribute name of attr whose value is suffixed (followed) by value.
trans-unit.target: 代表具有的属性名称元素ATTR，其值由后缀（接着）值。

trans-unit.source: Represents elements with an attribute name of attr.
trans-unit.target: 表示属性名称为attr的元素。

trans-unit.source: Represents every <p> element among a group of siblings. This is the same as a simple p selector. (Since n starts at zero, while the last element begins at one, n and n+1 will both select the same elements.)
trans-unit.target: 表示一组兄弟姐妹中的每个 <p> 元素。这与简单的 p 选择器相同。（由于 n 从零开始，而最后一个元素从一开始，因此 n 和 n+1 都会选择相同的元素。）

trans-unit.source: Represents every <p> element in a group of siblings. This selects the same elements as a simple p selector (although with a higher specificity).
trans-unit.target: 表示一组兄弟姐妹中的每个 <p> 元素。这将选择与简单的 p 选择器相同的元素（尽管具有更高的特异性）。

trans-unit.source: Represents every <p> that is the first element among a group of siblings, counting from the end. This is the same as the :last-child selector.
trans-unit.target: 从末尾算起，表示每个同级中的所有 <p> 。这与 :last-child 选择器相同。

trans-unit.source: Represents every <p> that is the first element in a group of siblings. This is the same as the :first-child selector (and has the same specificity).
trans-unit.target: 表示作为一组兄弟姐妹中第一个元素的每个 <p> 。这与 :first-child 选择器相同（并且具有相同的特异性）。

trans-unit.source: Represents the "cap height" (nominal height of capital letters) of the element’s font.
trans-unit.target: 表示元素 font 的“大写高度”（大写字母的标称高度）。

trans-unit.source: Represents the font-size of the root element (typically <html>). When used within the root element font-size, it represents its initial value (a common browser default is 16px, but user-defined preferences may modify this).
trans-unit.target: 表示根元素的 font-size （通常为 <html> ）。在根元素 font-size 中使用时，它表示其初始值（常见的浏览器默认值为 16px ，但是用户定义的首选项可能会对此进行修改）。

trans-unit.source: Represents the x-height of the element's font. On fonts with the "x" letter, this is generally the height of lowercase letters in the font; 1ex ≈ 0.5em in many fonts.
trans-unit.target: 表示元素 font 的x高度。在带有“ x”字母的字体上，通常是字体中小写字母的高度。许多字体中有 1ex ≈ 0.5em 。

trans-unit.source: Represents the calculated font-size of the element. If used on the font-size property itself, it represents the inherited font-size of the element.
trans-unit.target: 表示计算出的元素的 font-size 。如果在 font-size 属性本身上使用，它表示元素的继承的 font-size。

trans-unit.source: Represents the eighth through the fifteenth <p> elements of a group of siblings.
trans-unit.target: 表示一组兄弟姐妹的第八到第十五个 <p> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Represents the even rows of an HTML table: 2, 4, 6, etc.
trans-unit.target: 代表HTML表的偶数行:2、4、6等。

trans-unit.source: Represents the even rows of an HTML table: 2, 4, 6, etc., counting from the end.
trans-unit.target: 表示HTML表的偶数行:2、4、6等,从末尾算起。

trans-unit.source: Represents the first three elements. [=-0+3, -1+3, -2+3]

Represents the formula min(max-content, max(auto, argument)), which is calculated similar to auto (i.e. minmax(auto, max-content)), except that the track size is clamped at argument if it is greater than the auto minimum.
trans-unit.target: 代表式 min(max-content, max(auto, argument)) ，其计算类似于 auto （即 minmax(auto, max-content) ），不同之处在于轨道尺寸是在夹紧 argument ，如果它比越大 auto 最小值。

trans-unit.source: Represents the largest max-content contribution of the grid items occupying the grid track.
trans-unit.target: 表示占据网格轨迹的网格项的最大内容贡献。

trans-unit.source: Represents the largest min-content contribution of the grid items occupying the grid track.
trans-unit.target: 代表占据网格轨道的网格项的最大最小内容贡献。

trans-unit.source: Represents the last three elements among a group of siblings.
trans-unit.target: 代表一组兄弟姐妹中的最后三个要素。

trans-unit.source: Represents the number of dots per centimeter. As 1 inch is 2.54 cm, 1dpcm ≈ 2.54dpi.
trans-unit.target: 代表每厘米的点数。因为1英寸是2.54厘米， 1dpcm ≈ 2.54dpi 。

trans-unit.source: Represents the number of dots per inch. Screens typically contains 72 or 96 dots per inch, but the dpi for printed documents is usually much greater. As 1 inch is 2.54 cm, 1dpi ≈ 0.39dpcm.
trans-unit.target: 表示每英寸的点数。屏幕通常每英寸包含72或96点，但是打印文档的dpi通常更大。因为1英寸是2.54厘米， 1dpi ≈ 0.39dpcm 。

trans-unit.source: Represents the number of dots per px unit. Due to the 1:96 fixed ratio of CSS in to CSS px, 1dppx is equivalent to 96dpi, which corresponds to the default resolution of images displayed in CSS as defined by image-resolution.
trans-unit.target: 表示每 px 单位的点数。由于CSS的1:96固定比率 in 给CSS px ， 1dppx 相当于 96dpi ，通过所定义的，其对应于图像的默认分辨率显示在CSS image-resolution 。

trans-unit.source: Represents the odd rows of an HTML table: 1, 3, 5, etc.
trans-unit.target: 表示HTML表的奇数行。1、3、5等。

trans-unit.source: Represents the odd rows of an HTML table: 1, 3, 5, etc., counting from the end.
trans-unit.target: 表示HTML表的奇数行。1、3、5等,从末尾数起。

trans-unit.source: Represents the ordinal group to be used by the flex item. May be positive, negative, or 0.
trans-unit.target: 表示弹性项目要使用的序数组。可以为正，负或 0 。

trans-unit.source: Represents the seventh element, counting from the end.
trans-unit.target: 代表第七个元素,从末尾算起。

trans-unit.source: Represents the seventh element.
trans-unit.target: 代表第七个要素。

trans-unit.source: Represents the width, or more precisely the advance measure, of the glyph "0" (zero, the Unicode character U+0030) in the element's font.
trans-unit.target: 表示元素 font 字形“ 0”（零，Unicode字符U + 0030）的宽度，或更精确地说是超前量度。

trans-unit.source: Required inputs should also be indicated visually, using a treatment that does not rely solely on color to convey meaning. Typically, descriptive text and/or an icon are used.
trans-unit.target: 所需的输入也应以视觉方式表示,使用一种不单纯依靠颜色来表达意义的处理方式。典型的做法是使用描述性文字和/或图标。

trans-unit.source: Required. These <length> values specify the shadow's distance from the text. <offset-x> specifies the horizontal distance; a negative value places the shadow to the left of the text. <offset-y> specifies the vertical distance; a negative value places the shadow above the text. If both values are 0, the shadow is placed directly behind the text, although it may be partly visible due to the effect of <blur-radius>.
trans-unit.target: 需要。这些 <length> 值指定阴影距文本的距离。 <offset-x> 指定水平距离；负值会将阴影放在文本的左侧。 <offset-y> 指定垂直距离；负值会将阴影放在文本上方。如果两个值均为 0 ，则阴影会直接放置在文本后面，尽管由于 <blur-radius> 的影响，阴影可能会部分可见。

trans-unit.source: Requires Gecko 2.0(Firefox 4 / Thunderbird 3.3 / SeaMonkey 2.1)
trans-unit.target: 需要Gecko 2.0(Firefox 4/Thunderbird 3.3/SeaMonkey 2.1)

trans-unit.source: Requires Gecko 56
trans-unit.target: 需要Gecko 56

trans-unit.source: Requires a vendor prefix or different name for use.

trans-unit.source: Requires iOS 11 or later.
trans-unit.target: 需要iOS 11或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Requires macOS 10.13 High Sierra or later.
trans-unit.target: 需要macOS 10.13 High Sierra或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Resets the property to its natural value, which means that if the property is naturally inherited it acts like inherit, otherwise it acts like initial.
trans-unit.target: 将属性重置为其自然值，这意味着，如果该属性是自然继承的，则其作用类似于 inherit ，否则它的作用类似于 initial 。

trans-unit.source: Reverts the property to the value it would have had if the current origin had not applied any styles to it. In other words, the property's value is set to the user stylesheet's value for the property (if one is set), otherwise, the property's value is taken from the user agent's default stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: 将属性还原为当前原点没有应用任何样式时的值。换句话说,属性的值被设置为用户样式表的值(如果有设置的话),否则,属性的值从用户代理的默认样式表中提取。

trans-unit.source: Right-to-left block flow. Layout is vertical.
trans-unit.target: 从右到左的区块流。布局是垂直的。

trans-unit.source: Rolls back the cascade to the user level, so that the specified values are calculated as if no author-level rules were specified for the element. For purposes of revert, the Author origin includes the Override and Animation origins.
trans-unit.target: 将级联回滚到用户级别，以便计算指定的值，就像没有为该元素指定作者级别的规则一样。为了 revert ，“作者”原点包括“覆盖”和“动画”原点。

trans-unit.source: Rolls back the cascade to the user-agent level, so that the specified values are calculated as if no author-level or user-level rules were specified for the element.
trans-unit.target: 将级联回滚到用户代理程序级别，以便计算指定的值，就好像没有为元素指定作者级或用户级规则一样。

trans-unit.source: Rulesets are the main building blocks of a style sheet, which often consists of only a big list of them. But there is other information that a Web author wants to convey in the style sheet, like the character set, other external style sheets to import, font face or list counter descriptions and many more. It will use other and specific kinds of statements to do that.
trans-unit.target: 规则集是样式表的主要构件,样式表往往只由一大堆规则集组成。但Web作者还想在样式表中传达其他信息,比如字符集、其他外部样式表的导入、字体面或列表计数器的描述等等。它将使用其他和特定种类的语句来实现。

trans-unit.source: Run-in boxes
trans-unit.target: 进料箱

trans-unit.source: Run-in elements act like inlines or blocks, depending on the surrounding elements. That is: If the run-in box contains a block box, same as block. If a block box follows the run-in box, the run-in box becomes the first inline box of the block box. If an inline box follows, the run-in box becomes a block box.
trans-unit.target: 根据周围元素的不同,Run-in元素的作用就像inlines或block。也就是说。如果run-in box包含一个block box,就和block一样.如果一个块框紧跟在跑入框之后,跑入框就成为块框的第一个内联框。如果一个内嵌框紧随其后,运行中的框就变成了一个块状框。
